channel.title: Comments on: Searching for the Tianjin Antique Market

item.title: By: Kristen
item.dc:creator: Kristen
item.description:
Hello China!
I don't really know you guys - but I've been enjoying your blog so much! I'm a dental hygienist in Madison, WI and I've even been telling patients about your travels.
Thanks for the wonderful job you've been doing - I can visualize all the places you've been with your great descriptions.
Kristen Elsing KElsing@charter.net
item.content:encoded:
Hello China!

I don’t really know you guys – but I’ve been enjoying your blog so much! I’m a dental hygienist in Madison, WI
and I’ve even been telling patients about your travels.

Thanks for the wonderful job you’ve been doing – I can visualize all the places you’ve been with your great descriptions.

Kristen Elsing
KElsing@charter.net
